'''Perry-the-Winkle''' was a [[Hobbit]] of [[Michel Delving]], and the main character of the hobbit-poem ''[[Perry-the-Winkle]]''.

In the poem, Perry was the only hobbit who treated the [[Lonely Troll]] kindly, and in him the Troll found the friend he always wanted; the Troll often fed him and taught him how to be a great cook.<ref>{{AB|Perry}}</ref>

==Other versions of the legendarium==
The poem [[Perry-the-Winkle]] is a revision of a earlier story named ''The Bumpus''. In ''The Bumpus'', Perry is named William "Bill" Winkle. 
==Etymology==
''[[wikipedia:Periwinkle|Periwinckle]]'' is a marine mollusc and a creeping plant.<ref>{{HM|IE}}, "Giving of Names"</ref>
